title._content: Image taken from page 7 of 'Pictures of Travel. In Sweden, among the Hartz Mountains, and in Switzerland, with a visit at Charles Dickens's house, etc. [A translation of “I Sverrig,” “Skyggebilleder af en Reise til Harzen,” and part of “Reiseskizzer.”]'
